title: Art of Coloring: Tsum Tsum: 100 Images to Inspire Creativity
description: Part of the Art of Coloring series, which has sold over 2 million copies across the U.S.Tsum Tsum are everywhereâ€•in plush toys, games, apps, accessories, apparel, and now in their very own coloring book! Whether a skilled artist or an everyday dabbler of drawings and doodles, fans of all ages will be inspired by these irresistible pen-and-ink illustrations of Tsum Tsum characters and patterns! Collect the entire Art of Coloring series!
author: Walt Disney Company
